General.Name: Mena Transport Public Company Limited
General.Description: Mena Transport Public Company Limited provides concrete transportation concrete transportation services in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Transportation Services, Concrete Transportation Services and Sale of Materials, and Equipment and Tools for Construction. The company offers distributes and transport ready mixed concrete, industrial and consumer goods, and construction material services. Mena Transport Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Kaeng Khoi, Thailand.

0.Name: Ms. Suwanna  Kajonwuttidet
